entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain becoming mixed with drizzle this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
